result.reason: At least two users requested per-connection hostname/IP switching and a maintainer already indicated a profile-based implementation path.
result.approach: Add an optional alternate address with a profile-based connect override, resolve the selected address at connect-time, and persist it in existing serializers with backward compatibility.
